info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 7:26PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fulton, central Saratoga and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 800 PM EST... At 726 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Johnstown, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saratoga Springs, Amsterdam, Gloversville, Johnstown, Fonda, Ballston Spa, Ephratah, Broadalbin, Hagaman, Mayfield, Round Lake, Fort Johnson, Galway, Cranberry Creek, Rock City Falls, Tribes Hill, Caroga Lake Public Campground, North Ballston Spa, Kings and Mount Pleasant. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 28. Interstate 87 between exits 12 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
